a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Average score for 8th graders on the TIMSS mathematics assessment
TIMSS: Mean performance on the mathematics scale for eighth grade students, male
TIMSS: Mean performance on the mathematics scale for eighth
Data source: International Association for the Evaluation of Educational Achievement (IEA)'s Trends in International Mathematics and Science
